metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21899 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the dwgCompressor::copyCompBytes21 functionality of LibreCad libdxfrw 2.2.0-rc2-19-ge02f3580. A specially-crafted .dwg file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: librecad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
